Detailed Description

wxColourPicker class.

This class provides a widgets which allows the user to pick a colour from a palette. You can customize several parameters of the palette: thw width of the square colours, the separation between them, the number of rows and the number of columns. In order to change this settings, open wx/colourpicker.h and change the defines that are at the top of the file.
